div1.p:
The Yellow Fever Commission met pursuant to the call of the
Chairman. Present-- Doctors Finlay, Guiteras, Albertini and Gorgas.
The Commission then proceeded to Las Animas and examined:
Case 1, Samuel Calvin, and pronounced it not yellow fever.
The Commission then proceeded to Benefica and examined:
Case 2, Manuel Gomez Lopez and pronounced it yellow fever.
